00017 from xml.dom.minidom import *
00018 import codecs
00019 import xml.sax
00020 import sys, string
00021 from XML.FB_XML_HANDLER import FB_ProductXMLHandler
00022 from XML.FB_XML_HANDLER import FB_AppXMLHandler
00023 
00024 ##Class for Extracting Products from FB-XML Productfiles
00025 class FB_XMLHandler(xml.sax.ContentHandler):
00026 
00027     __LogObj = None
00028     __products = []
00029     __prod = None
00030     __prod_XMLHandler = None     #private object of FB_ProductXMLHandler
00031     __app_XMLHandler = None      #private object of FB_AppXMLHandler
00032 
00033     #Constructor for FB_XMLHandler.
00034     def __init__(self, LogObj):
00035         self.__LogObj = LogObj
00036         #Product-Handling
00037         self.__prod_XMLHandler = FB_ProductXMLHandler.FB_ProductXMLHandler(self.__LogObj)
00038         #Application-Handling
00039         self.__app_XMLHandler = FB_AppXMLHandler.FB_AppXMLHandler(self.__LogObj)
00040 
00041     #return List of Instances of type FB_Products
00042     def getProductList(self):
00043         return self.__prod_XMLHandler.getProductList()
00044 
00045     #return List of Instances of type FB_Applications
00046     def getAppList(self):
00047         return self.__app_XMLHandler.getAppList()
00048 
00049     #return List of Instances of type FB_Manufacturer
00050     def getManufacturerList(self):
00051         return self.__app_XMLHandler.getManufacturerList()
00052 
00053 
00054     def startDocument(self):
00055         try:
00056             pass
00057 
00058         except SAXException:
00059             print "SAXError"
00060 
00061     def endDocument(self):
00062         try:
00063             pass
00064 
00065         except SAXException:
00066             print "SAXError"
00067 
00068     def startElement(self, eName, attrs):
00069         try:
00070             self.__prod_XMLHandler.startElement(eName, attrs)
00071             self.__app_XMLHandler.startElement(eName, attrs)
00072 
00073         except SAXException:
00074             print "Error again"
00075 
00076     def endElement(self,eName):
00077         try:
00078             self. __prod_XMLHandler.endElement(eName)
00079             self.__app_XMLHandler.endElement(eName)
00080 
00081         except SAXException:
00082             print "Error again"
00083 
00084 
00085     def characters(self ,char):
00086         try:
00087             self.__prod_XMLHandler.characters(char)
00088             self.__app_XMLHandler.characters(char)
00089 
00090         except SAXException:
00091              print "Error again"
